actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to amend the Economic Stabilization Act of 1970, to stabilize rents at their January 10, 1973 level, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to issue such orders and regulations as he deems appropriate to stabilize rents at their January 10, 1973 levels. Limits future rent increases to five percent per annum.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Economic Stabilization Act of 1970, to stabilize rents at their January 10, 1973 level, and for other purposes.
